name: Cloudhoof Assassin
description: The Cloudhoof Assassin is characterized by its agility and strength, featuring notable muscular build and the ability to charge at enemies. It has high physical power and dexterity, making it a formidable opponent.
memorable: Its special ability Shoving Charge can reposition enemies, significantly impacting battlefield dynamics.
goals: To tactically control the battlefield using its pushing abilities and maintain agility in combat.
relations: May be encountered with other beasts or as a guard creature in rugged terrains.
environment: Commonly found in rocky or rugged environments.
strengths: Exceptional strength and dexterity scores, along with advantages on relevant checks to resist being knocked prone.
weaknesses: Very low intelligence and charisma, making it less perceptive and social.
attacks: Can perform a multiattack with a Headbutt and a Shoving Kick, employing pushing mechanics to control positioning.
most_powerful_ability: Shoving Charge allows it to push enemies back, potentially altering battlefield positioning.
skills: Basic perception skills reflect its average wisdom.
additional_information: Has advantage on climbing and balance on rocky surfaces.
With its strong physical attributes, it excels in melee combat.
Utilizes its environment effectively to ambush foes.
Can push targets away, creating space and protecting itself.
Moderate hit points for a creature of its challenge rating.
test_queries: tactical creature that can push enemies
strong melee beast with charge ability
beast that excels in rocky environments
